TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 支援網頁剖析器建置控制項及其包含的子控制項。

span.span: Supports the page parser in building a control and the child controls it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，每個頁面上的控制項是預設值相關聯類別。By default, every control on a page is associated with a default class. 在剖析期間，ASP.NET 網頁架構建立的樹狀結構對應至頁面控制項樹狀結構的物件。During parsing, the ASP.NET page framework builds a tree of objects corresponding to the tree of controls for the page. 樹狀目錄再用來產生頁面的程式碼，以建立控制項樹狀結構。The tree is then used to generate page code to create the control tree. 子控制項，除了定義行為的控制項標記內的內容剖析的方式。In addition to child controls, the defines the behavior of how the content within control tags is parsed. 您可以定義自己的自訂控制項產生器類別，以覆寫此預設行為。You can override this default behavior by defining your own custom control builder class. 這是藉由套用屬性至您的控制項產生器類別，如下所示：This is done by applying a attribute to your control builder class as follows: `[ControlBuilderAttribute(typeof(ControlBuilderType))]` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立建立資料表時定義其屬性和內容的控制項。The following code example creates a control whose attributes and content are defined at the time the table is built. 以下是要用來建置可執行檔的命令列。The following is the command line to use to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /r:System.Drawing.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/vb_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/cs_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會使用先前的自訂控制項。The following code example uses the previous custom control. 特別的是，它是根據其屬性，而且內容會定義在執行階段。In particular, it builds a table whose attributes and content are defined at run time. 請注意，指示詞中顯示的值會反映先前的命令列。Notice that the values shown in the directive reflect the previous command line. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create a new instance the class. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式通常由 ASP.NET 剖析頁面時及建立控制項階層架構。This constructor is generally used by ASP.NET when parsing the page and creating the control hierarchy. 它並不適用於您的程式碼。It is not intended for use in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed
Public Overridable Function AllowWhitespaceLiterals () As Boolean
abstract member AllowWhitespaceLiterals : unit -> bool override this.AllowWhitespaceLiterals : unit -> bool

summary.span: 判斷控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容是否允許空白字元常值。

span.span: Determines whether white space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來判斷的開頭和結尾標記的控制項之間的內容中是否允許空白字元常值。The method is used to determine whether white space literals are permitted in the content between the opening and closing tags of a control. 當這個方法傳回`false`，從內容會修剪空白字元常值，才能處理頁面剖析器內容。When this method returns `false`, the white space literals are trimmed from the content before the content is processed by the page parser. 當這個方法傳回`true`，不會移除空白字元常值。When this method returns `true`, the white space literals not removed. 這個方法在剖析期間由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，並不是直接在您的程式碼呼叫。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#4)]

span.para: 您可以指出是否允許泛空白字元常值，以在您的自訂控制項衍生類別中覆寫這個方法。
You can override this method in your derived class to indicate whether white space literals are permitted in your custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AppendLiteralString(string s) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub AppendLiteralString (s As String)
abstract member AppendLiteralString : string -> unit override this.AppendLiteralString : string -> unit

param.name: s
param.span: 要加入該控制項的內容。

span.span: The content to add to the control.

summary.span: 將指定的常值內容加入控制項。

span.span: Adds the specified literal content to a control.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫處理方法，以控制如何常值控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。Override the method to control how literal content between the control's opening and closing tags is processed. 常值內容可以是任何瀏覽器傳遞至伺服器控制項的文字。Literal content can be any text that is passed by the browser to the server control. 例如，任何 HTML 項目和文字，其開頭和結尾標記之間是常值內容。For example, any HTML elements and text, between their opening and closing tags, are literal content. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 字串常值的語式不正確。

span.span: The string literal is not well formed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentFilterResolutionService As IFilterResolutionService
public: property System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService ^ CurrentFilterResolutionService { System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，用於設計工具中剖析和保存控制項時，管理裝置篩選條件相關的服務。

span.span: Gets an object that is used to manage device-filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

value.span: 物件，用於設計工具中剖析和保存控制項時，管理裝置篩選條件相關的服務。

span.span: An object that is used to manage device filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面是專為控制項設計工具中所使用的裝置篩選條件介面。The interface is an interface that is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer. 當剖析的控制項或內容以外的瀏覽器要求，設計工具中保存提供一個方式來判斷目前的控制項是否受指定的篩選器，以及指定的篩選器是特定的裝置篩選的一部分階層架構。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine whether the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常值的字串是指的開頭和結尾標記的 HTML 控制項之間的文字。A literal string refers to the text between the opening and closing tag of an HTML control. 時文字會轉換成字串表示的瀏覽器會顯示而不是解譯為 HTML，HTML 編碼。HTML encoding is when text is converted into a string representation that the browser will display rather than interpret as HTML. 字元，例如問題標記 （？）、 連字號 (&)、 斜線符號 （/），和空格可能會被截斷或某些瀏覽器中，損毀，因此必須編碼這些字元，當它們出現在`a`標記或查詢字串中。Characters such as the question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers, so those characters must be encoded when they appear in `a` tags or in query strings. 方法在剖析期間由 ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫，並不是直接在您的程式碼呼叫。The method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫方法，以允許 HTML 解碼這個產生器會套用至任何控制項中的常值字串。The following example overrides the method to allow HTML decoding of literal strings in any control this builder is applied to. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/cs/ctrlbuilder1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/VB/ctrlbuilder1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 此範例會覆寫方法來檢查屬性來判斷何種控制這個產生器會套用至。This example overrides the method to check the property to determine what type of control this builder is applied to. 如果它是`CustomTextBox`，產生器檢查是否值屬性包含控制項中。If it is a `CustomTextBox`, the builder checks whether the value of the property is included in the control. 如果因此發生例外狀況，如果不是呼叫方法。If so, an exception is thrown, if not the method is called. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode (System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessGeneratedCode(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod) cil managed

public: virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode(System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ baseType, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ derivedType, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ buildMethod, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ dataBindingMethod);

abstract member ProcessGeneratedCode : System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod -> unit override this.ProcessGeneratedCode : System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod * System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod -> unit

param.name: codeCompileUnit
param.span: 正在建置控制項之 CodeDOM 圖形的根容器。

span.span: The root container of a CodeDOM graph of the control that is being built.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 網頁或使用者控制項的基底型別，包含正在建置的控制項。

span.span: The base type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: derivedType
param.span: 網頁或使用者控制項的衍生型別，包含正在建置的控制項。

span.span: The derived type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 用來建置控制項的程式碼。

span.span: The code that is used to build the control.

param.name: dataBindingMethod
param.span: 程式碼，用來建置控制項的資料繫結方法。

span.span: The code that is used to build the data-binding method of the control.

summary.span: 讓自訂控制項產生器存取產生的程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDom)，並在剖析及建置控制項的過程中插入及修改程式碼。

span.span: Enables custom control builders to access the generated Code Document Object Model (CodeDom) and insert and modify code during the process of parsing and building controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在單一檔案 頁面模型中，`baseType`並`derivedType`參數都是相同型別通常衍生自類別。In the single-file page model, the `baseType` and `derivedType` parameters are the same type, which typically derives from the class. 在程式碼後置頁面模型中，`baseType`已型別，表示部分的程式碼後置類別，通常衍生自類別。In the code-behind page model, `baseType` is the type that represents the partial code-behind class, which is typically derived from the class. `derivedType`參數是衍生自部分類別，其中包含標記的類別。The `derivedType` parameter is the class that derives from the partial class that contains the markup. 如需有關 ASP.NET Web 頁面模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information about ASP.NET Web page models, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). 如需如何使用 CodeDOM 表示，並產生原始碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[動態原始程式碼的產生和編譯](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation.md)。For more information about how to use the CodeDOM to represent and generate source code, see [Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation.md).

summary.span: 取得 物件，這個物件在設計階段用來管理控制項主題和面板。

span.span: Gets an object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

value.span: 物件，這個物件在設計階段用來管理控制項主題和面板。

span.span: An object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面是一個或多個容器物件，進而提供套用佈景主題和控制面板的控制項設計工具中建立時的物件。The interface is a container for one or more objects, which in turn supply the objects that apply themes and control skins to controls when they are created in a designer.
